sentences: From 1998 to 2007, Brockmann owned NuMedia Studios on lower Broadway in New York City.
Brockmann has been nominated for more than 30 Grammy Awards, and has won twice: for Christina Aguilera's 2000 album Mi Reflejo and for Kirk Franklin's 1999 album The Nu Nation Project.
His mix of "There You'll Be" from the film Pearl Harbor was nominated for a 2001 "Best Song" Oscar.
